  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120505</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120505</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Coulombov izziv</string>
            <string language="en">Run Coulomb's Gauntlet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie Handschuh Des Coulombs Laufen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exécutez Le Gantelet du Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funcione O Gauntlet Do Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia funzionare Il Guantone di protezione Del 
Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γάντι του Coulomb τρεξίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejecute El Guantelete Del Culombio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo pozitvnih in negativnih delcev pelji pozitvni delec preko ovir do cilja.</string>
            <string language="en">Guide the positively charged particle safely around obstacles to the target with the use of positively or negatively charged particles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">coulomb's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie den positiv belasteten Partikel 
sicher um Hindernisse zum Ziel mit dem Gebrauch positiv oder auflud 
negativ Partikel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guidez la particule franchement chargée sans 
risque autour des obstacles à la cible avec l'utilisation de 
franchement ou négativement a chargé des particules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guie a partícula com segurança positivamente 
carregada em torno dos obstáculos ao alvo com o uso carregou de 
positivamente ou negativamente partículas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guidi la particella sicuro positivamente caricata
intorno agli ostacoli all'obiettivo con l'uso di positivamente o 
negativamente ha caricato le particelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοδηγήστε το θετικά χρεωμένο μόριο ακίνδυνα γύρω 
από τα εμπόδια στο στόχο με τη χρήση των θετικά ή αρνητικά 
χρεωμένων μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirija la partícula positivamente con seguridad 
cargada alrededor de obstáculos a la blanco con el uso cargó de 
positivamente o negativamente partículas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Coulombs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del culombio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electrostática</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
